Title: Connect-CMS Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
Description:
### Impact

There is a Privilege Escalation Vulnerability on the management system of Connect-CMS.
Affercted Version : Connect-CMS 1.7.1, 2.3.1 and earlier

### Patches

version 1.7.2, 2.3.2

### Workarounds

Upgrade Connect-CMS to latest version
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.7.2, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.3.2
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.7.2 before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.3.2
